history.content:
Please join us next Tuesday, June 30th, at 5:00pm for the UC Berkeley Cloud Meetup featuring RTL's Sandeep Jayaprakash, Professor Carlos Maltzahn and Stephanie Lieggi from the UC Santa Cruz Center for Research in Open Source Software (CROSS), and a Skydeck startup talk by Ariadne Maps.
 
RSVP here: https://www.meetup.com/ucberkeley_cloudmeetup/events/271035943/ or on bCal if you are part of the Cloud Computing Community of Practice.
 
AGENDA 
 
5:00 Host welcome and announcements
 
5:10: Speaker: Professor Carlos Maltzahn, Founder & Director of the UC Santa Cruz Center for Research in Open Source Software (CROSS) and Stephanie Lieggi, Assistant Director, CROSS will present about the Ceph project. Ceph is an open-source software storage platform which implements object storage on a single distributed computer cluster.
 
5:40 SkyDeck Startup Showcase: Lightning talk by Georgios Pipelidis and Nikolaos Tsiamitros, Founders of Ariadne Maps. Ariadne is a precise and anonymous customer location tracking solution for business enterprises.
 
5:50 Speaker: Sandeep Jayaprakash from UC Berkeley will talk about an advising application and the AWS data lake architecture that support learning analytics.
 
6:30 pm - End/ "Doors" close - this is when we expect to sign off.
 
Everyone is welcome - this is a really inclusive group! You don't have to be an expert, or already know about cloud technologies; we get together so people can learn from each other. 
 
Also a reminder that we are always on the lookout for new presenters -- here is your invitation to nominate people or teams to present at the meetup:  https://forms.gle/7akEASGajijXFyYz6
 
You can RSVP here: https://www.meetup.com/ucberkeley_cloudmeetup/events/271035943/
or on bCal if you've signed up for the cloud community of practice.
history.subject: NEXT WEEK! UC Berkeley Cloud Meetup 015 June 30th w/ UC Santa Cruz, RTL and Ariadne Maps
